REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f9612 reute u f BC-GREYHOUND-CORP-<G>-CO 03-18 0074

TEXT.TITLE: GREYHOUND CORP <G> COMPLETES BUS LINE SALE
TEXT.BODY: Greyhound corp said it completed the sale of its Greyhound Lines unit to Dallas-based GLI Holdings Inc for 350 mln dlrs in cash, securities, royalties and other considerations. Greyhound said GLI is authorized to continue using the familiar running dog logo on a red, white and blue shield, while Greyhound Corp will continue to use the running dog alone as its symbol. Reuter
